titleStmt.title: Saints no smiters, or, Smiting civil powers not the work of saints being a treatise, shewing the doctrine and atempts of Quinto-Monarchians, or, Fifth-Monarchy-Men about smiting powers, to be damnable and antichristian / by John Tombes ...
titleStmt.author: Tombes, John, 1603?-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.D. for Henry Eversden ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
